Let $ S$ be the set of the $ 2005$ smallest multiples of $ 4$, and let $ T$ be the set of the $ 2005$ smallest positive multiples of $ 6$. How many elements are common to $ S$ and $ T$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 166\qquad 
\textbf{(B)}\ 333\qquad 
\textbf{(C)}\ 500\qquad 
\textbf{(D)}\ 668\qquad 
\textbf{(E)}\ 1001$
